vdb.name: restwebservice
vdb.description: Shows how to call Web Services

model.name: Customers
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW CustomersView ( customernumber varchar(100), customername varchar(200), contactlastname varchar(100), contactfirstname varchar(100), phone varchar(50), addressline1 varchar(100), addressline2 varchar(100), city varchar(100), state varchar(100), postalcode varchar(50), country varchar(100), salesrepemployeenumber varchar(100), creditlimit varchar(100) ) AS SELECT A.customernumber, A.customername, A.contactlastname, A.contactfirstname, A.phone, A.addressline1, A.addressline2, A.city, A.state, A.postalcode, A.country, A.salesrepemployeenumber, A.creditlimit FROM (EXEC CustomerSource.invokeHttp('GET', null, 'http://localhost:8080/CustomerRESTWebSvc/MyRESTApplication/customerList', 'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/customers/customer' PASSING XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT f.result) COLUMNS customernumber string PATH 'customernumber/text()', customername string PATH 'customername/text()', contactlastname string PATH 'contactlastname/text()', contactfirstname string PATH 'contactfirstname/text()', phone string PATH 'phone/text()', addressline1 string PATH 'addressline1/text()', addressline2 string PATH 'addressline2/text()', state string PATH 'state/text()', city string PATH 'city/text()', postalcode string PATH 'postalcode/text()', country string PATH 'country/text()', salesrepemployeenumber string PATH 'salesrepemployeenumber/text()', creditlimit string PATH 'creditlimit/text()') AS A;
